ListenList: When you want something, say "please." For example, "Can I have some water, please?" This makes people happy and shows you are polite.
What do you say when you want something?
Please.
Why should you say "please"?
It makes people happy.
When you want something, you should say "please," is it right?
When you want something, you should say "thank you," is it right?
When someone gives you something, say "thank you." For example, "Thank you for the toy." This shows you are grateful.
What do you say when someone gives you something?
Thank you.
Why should you say "thank you"?
It shows you are grateful.
When someone gives you something, you should say "thank you," is it right?
When someone gives you something, you should say "sorry," is it right?
When you make a mistake, say "sorry." For example, "I am sorry I spilled the juice." This shows you care about others' feelings.
What do you say when you make a mistake?
Sorry.
Why should you say "sorry"?
It shows you care about others.
When you make a mistake, you should say "sorry," is it right?
When you make a mistake, you should say "thank you," is it right?
When you meet someone, say "hello." For example, "Hello, Grandma!" This makes people feel welcome.
What do you say when you meet someone?
Hello.
Why should you say "hello"?
It makes people feel welcome.
When you meet someone, you should say "hello," is it right?
When you meet someone, you should say "goodbye," is it right?
When you leave, say "goodbye." For example, "Goodbye, friends!" This shows you are polite.
What do you say when you leave?
Goodbye.
Why should you say "goodbye"?
It shows you are polite.
When you leave, you should say "goodbye," is it right?
When you leave, you should say "hello," is it right?
When you ask for help, say "please." For example, "Please help me with my shoes." This shows you are polite.
What do you say when you ask for help?
Please.
Why should you say "please"?
It shows you are polite.
When you ask for help, you should say "please," is it right?
When you ask for help, you should say "sorry," is it right?
When you receive a gift, say "thank you." For example, "Thank you for the gift." This makes the giver happy.
What do you say when you receive a gift?
Thank you.
Why should you say "thank you"?
It makes the giver happy.
When you receive a gift, you should say "thank you," is it right?
When you receive a gift, you should say "please," is it right?
When you accidentally hurt someone, say "sorry." For example, "I am sorry I stepped on your foot." This shows you are considerate.
What do you say when you hurt someone?
Sorry.
Why should you say "sorry"?
It shows you are considerate.
When you accidentally hurt someone, you should say "sorry," is it right?
When you accidentally hurt someone, you should say "thank you," is it right?
When you start a conversation, say "hello." For example, "Hello, how are you?" This starts the conversation nicely.
What do you say to start a conversation?
Hello.
Why should you say "hello"?
It starts the conversation nicely.
When you start a conversation, you should say "hello," is it right?
When you start a conversation, you should say "goodbye," is it right?
When you finish a conversation, say "goodbye." For example, "Goodbye, see you later!" This ends the conversation politely.
What do you say to end a conversation?
Goodbye.
Why should you say "goodbye"?
It ends the conversation politely.
When you finish a conversation, you should say "goodbye," is it right?
When you finish a conversation, you should say "hello," is it right?

ListenList: During the day, the sun shines bright. We play outside. Daytime is warm and light.
When does the sun shine bright?
During the day.
What do we do outside?
We play outside.
The sun shines bright during the day, is it right?
The sun shines bright at night, is it right?
At night, the moon and stars come out. We sleep in our beds. Nighttime is dark and quiet.
When do the moon and stars come out?
At night.
What do we do at night?
We sleep.
The moon and stars come out at night, is it right?
The moon and stars come out during the day, is it right?
In the morning, the sun rises. We wake up and have breakfast. Morning is the start of the day.
When does the sun rise?
In the morning.
What do we do in the morning?
We wake up and have breakfast.
The sun rises in the morning, is it right?
The sun sets in the morning, is it right?
In the evening, the sun sets. We have dinner and get ready for bed. Evening is the end of the day.
When does the sun set?
In the evening.
What do we do in the evening?
We have dinner and get ready for bed.
The sun sets in the evening, is it right?
The sun rises in the evening, is it right?
During the day, it is light outside. We go to school. Daytime is for activities.
When is it light outside?
During the day.
What do we do during the day?
We go to school.
It is light outside during the day, is it right?
It is dark outside during the day, is it right?
At night, it is dark outside. We see the stars. Nighttime is for resting.
When is it dark outside?
At night.
What do we see at night?
We see the stars.
It is dark outside at night, is it right?
It is light outside at night, is it right?
In the afternoon, the sun is high. We play and learn. Afternoon is warm and bright.
When is the sun high?
In the afternoon.
What do we do in the afternoon?
We play and learn.
The sun is high in the afternoon, is it right?
The sun is low in the afternoon, is it right?
At night, we hear crickets. We read bedtime stories. Nighttime is calm and peaceful.
When do we hear crickets?
At night.
What do we read at night?
We read bedtime stories.
We hear crickets at night, is it right?
We hear birds at night, is it right?
During the day, birds sing. We eat lunch. Daytime is busy and fun.
When do birds sing?
During the day.
What do we eat during the day?
We eat lunch.
Birds sing during the day, is it right?
Birds sing at night, is it right?
At night, we dream. We cuddle with our toys. Nighttime is cozy and restful.
When do we dream?
At night.
What do we cuddle with at night?
We cuddle with our toys.
We dream at night, is it right?
We play outside at night, is it right?

ListenList: When I am happy, I smile. I feel good inside. Happiness is a nice feeling.
What do I do when I am happy?
I smile.
How do I feel inside?
I feel good.
When I am happy, I smile, is it right?
When I am happy, I cry, is it right?
When I am sad, I cry. I feel tears on my face. Sadness is a heavy feeling.
What do I do when I am sad?
I cry.
What do I feel on my face?
I feel tears.
When I am sad, I cry, is it right?
When I am sad, I smile, is it right?
When I am angry, I frown. My face gets red. Anger is a strong feeling.
What do I do when I am angry?
I frown.
What color does my face get?
My face gets red.
When I am angry, I frown, is it right?
When I am angry, I laugh, is it right?
When I am scared, I tremble. My heart beats fast. Fear is a surprising feeling.
What do I do when I am scared?
I tremble.
How does my heart beat?
My heart beats fast.
When I am scared, I tremble, is it right?
When I am scared, I jump for joy, is it right?
When I am excited, I jump. I feel full of energy. Excitement is a fun feeling.
What do I do when I am excited?
I jump.
How do I feel?
I feel full of energy.
When I am excited, I jump, is it right?
When I am excited, I sleep, is it right?
When I am tired, I yawn. I feel sleepy. Tiredness is a slow feeling.
What do I do when I am tired?
I yawn.
How do I feel?
I feel sleepy.
When I am tired, I yawn, is it right?
When I am tired, I run, is it right?
When I am surprised, I open my eyes wide. I feel amazed. Surprise is a sudden feeling.
What do I do when I am surprised?
I open my eyes wide.
How do I feel?
I feel amazed.
When I am surprised, I open my eyes wide, is it right?
When I am surprised, I close my eyes, is it right?
When I am confused, I scratch my head. I feel puzzled. Confusion is a mixed feeling.
What do I do when I am confused?
I scratch my head.
How do I feel?
I feel puzzled.
When I am confused, I scratch my head, is it right?
When I am confused, I know everything, is it right?

I stand tall.
How do I feel?
I feel accomplished.
When I am proud, I stand tall, is it right?
When I am proud, I hide, is it right?

How do I feel?
I feel peaceful.
